channel.title: Free Music, like the old napster?
channel.description:
Hello. I got a gay 1gb mp3 player and limewire + utorrent are to slow to get music.
Does anyone know something like the old-school napster, where you can get any song free?
Thanks :D
*also, whats the best song by korn?*

item.title: Free Music, like the old napster?

item.description:
@Phaze_X wrote:

mp3000.com It owns!

Read full topic

item.title: Free Music, like the old napster?
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

Torrents are the way forward, i use Azureus.

I downloaded the “Bad Religion” Discography - 15 albums today with it.

youve only got a 1Gb it really isnt gona be that hard to fill, so take your time over it.

Read full topic
item.source: Free Music, like the old napster?

item.title: Free Music, like the old napster?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

1337h4x:

The bad thing is that you have to find every single song in the album, and then it doesn’t tell you how many sources there are in the screen where you select what to download.

Ok, tip for torrenting:

Only use torrents with >10 seeds and if it’s slow check if your ports are forwarded(make sure you forward to your internal IP). I find it best to torrent on a desktop PC 24/7, I suggest 2-3 torrents max. You should find complete discography’s of bands to torrent, they are the best and often have the most reliable amount of seeders. Although most torrent sites say it’s bad to torrent >5 torrents at once, as long as each torrent gets a >= 1 share ratio it’s all fine.

Read full topic
